reviewText: All of our kids LOVE watching this!! They even watch it in the summer! :)  Good story, just charming.  The music is outstanding!  Adults can enjoy this too! :)
Title: Little Spirit: Christmas in New York

reviewText: Painful to sit through, but I did for my son. It was boring. I didn't care for the storyline. A real stinker!
summary: The worst Christmas movie I have ever seen.

reviewText: My grand daughters loved this movie.  Especially my 4 year old.  She watches a lot.Danny Devito is so fun as the cab driver.  The little dog, Ramona, is very adorable.  I recommend it to anyone with young children.
Title: Little Spirit: Christmas in New York

reviewText: I bought this movie based off of a recommendation from Amazon. I am going to enjoy watching this with my young nephews. One of them really likes dog movies right know so the fact that this movie is about a young boy and his dog is a huge plus for me. I went ahead and watched it already, it will be able to hold my nephews attention. It is not to long that a kid would get bored watching. But there is enough of the movie to have a nice story. I also enjoyed the music through out the movie because my nephews really like dancing to the music in movies. It is funny to watch. This is a good movie to show younger kids about Christmas. I liked the fact that it was not all about Santa and that stuff. Don't get me wrong, I like Santa. I found the little spirit to be very cute and funny in some of its antics with helping the young boy find his missing dog. This should be a movie I can enjoy with my family for years to come.
Title: Little Spirit: Christmas in New York

reviewText: This light-hearted Christmas story was very good. My wife and I have different, subjective, views of the graphics:  She loved them; I sort of liked them.  Objectively though, this is good family fun and worth the time to view it.
Title: Little Spirit: Christmas in New York

reviewText: I purchased this movie to have when my grandchildren come for Christmas.They will like the colors and movement.One may need to remember that children need movies on their level when we sit down and watch with them.I will be able to sit and watch it with my grandchildren and enjoy the time sharing it my them.The cabbie shows that even in trying situations we can make the best of it putting others first.
Title: Little Spirit: Christmas in New York

reviewText: I purchased this for my 4-year-old grandson, and he loves this movie - especially the puppy.  It is a cute story.
summary: Little Spirit: Christmas in New York
